name: A Platformer for Ants
description:
This game is a simple platformer. If you fall on spikes or monsters you die, and you’ll respawn on the last checkpoint.

Oh, also, every new room you discover has to fit to the screen, so, everytime you enter a new room, everything shrinks to fit on your screen. The checkpoints will reset this.

Entry for the Ludum Dare 40.

Main character  by GrafxKid 

Music: “8bit Dungeon Boss” by Kevin MacLeod
